name: lobular
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having or relating to lobes (= parts that seem to be separate from the rest of the organ, etc.): This lobular appearance is characteristic of the presence of cartilage. Lobular cancer accounts for about 15% of all invasive breast cancers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe liver has a distinct lobular anatomy.The biopsy showed mild lobular inflammation.Drinking alcohol is known to be more strongly linked to lobular tumours.These particular lesions originate from the terminal duct lobular unit.She was diagnosed with invasive lobular cancer - cancer that begins in the milk glands.
